ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of ERIKA CHAMBERLAIN of London, Ontario, to be a special adviser to the Prime Minister, to serve as a member of the Independent Advisory Board for Supreme Court of Canada Judicial Appointments, to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year.
